select COP_NO, MEM_NO, COP_TYPE, COP_USED, COP_USEDATE from coupon

select m.mem_no, m.mem_id, m.mem_name, m.mem_birthdate, m.mem_email, m.mem_phoneno, m.mem_mileage, m.mem_membertype, m.mem_joindate, c.cop_no, c.cop_type, c.cop_used, c.cop_usedate from member m, coupon c where m.mem_no = c.mem_no and m.mem_name like '%'||#{value}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPON(COP_NO, MEM_NO, COP_TYPE, COP_USED, COP_USEDATE) values(COUPON_SEQ.nextval,#{MemNo},#{coupType},#{coupUsed},#{coupUsedDate})
